doc:
Jeff Garlin https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Jeff_Garlin 0 Jeffrey Todd Garlin (born June 5, 1962) is an American comedian, actor, producer, director, and writer. He is widely known for playing Jeff Greene on the HBO show Curb Your Enthusiasm, Mort Meyers on Arrested Development for Fox and Netflix and the patriarch of the titular family in the ABC sitcom The Goldbergs. He has also appeared in ParaNorman, Wall-E, Toy Story 3 and Safety Not Guaranteed, among other films and has hosted his own podcast on Earwolf since 2013. Jeffrey_Todd_Garlin ( born June_5_,_1962 ) is an_American_comedian , actor , producer , director , and writer . He is_widely_known for playing Jeff_Greene on the_HBO_show Curb Your_Enthusiasm , Mort_Meyers on Arrested_Development for Fox_and_Netflix and the_patriarch of the_titular_family in the_ABC_sitcom The_Goldbergs . He has_also_appeared in ParaNorman , Wall-E , Toy_Story_3 and Safety Not Guaranteed , among other_films and has_hosted his_own_podcast on Earwolf since 2013 .
